Example: Calculating Parents’ DIC Monthly Payment
Situation
:  A DIC parent (one of two parents not living with spouse) submitted an original application which VA received on November 15, 2014.  After reviewing all evidence of record, an end user determined the parent has an IVAP of $1,160.  Additionally, VA has rated the parent to be in need of aid and attendance (A&A).
